mapper.select: select * from Flight where Flight_Num = #{flight_num} and Airline_Name = #{airline_name};
mapper.insert: insert into Flight (Flight_Num, Airline_Name, From_Airport, To_Airport, Departure_Time, Arrival_Time, Flight_Date, Cost, Capacity) values (#{flight_num}, #{airline_name}, #{from_airport}, #{to_airport}, #{departure_time}, #{arrival_time}, #{flight_date}, #{cost}, #{capacity});
